name: Cats Story
summary:
Run your dream restaurant (which is run by cats!)
Open a cozy restaurant and make delicious meals for your feline friends

Develop a wide variety of recipes to satisfy your customers' taste buds!
From fresh fish stew to a luxurious catnip dessert, your restaurant is sure to be a hit with the neighborhood cats! Become a beloved chef by creating 5-star meals that are both healthy and delicious!

Teamwork is the recipe for success!
If you want to be successful, you can't do it alone! Hire and manage your staff and make sure you find the right cats for the job!

Now's your chance to open your own special restaurant
